name: Bad Build (Pascone)
description:
Take the role of a QA Tester for the new hit game Alien: Ship Happens. Your only task is to complete all of the levels. The problem is, the game build is UNSTABLE so each level has a set of different bugs that you will have to work around or else the game will crash.

CONTROLS:

A & D to move

W to jump

SPACE to fire your laser (can be held)

R to reset the level
